headline: OMNICOM MEDIA STUDY REVEALS NEW RULES FOR BRAND GROWTH IN THE ERA OF FRAGMENTED INFLUENCE
summary: Omnicom Media, an Omnicom (NYSE: OMC) Connected Capability, today released a new research report - TheFuture of Brand Influence - revealing how the dynamics of brand growth are being reshaped by a fragmented and increasingly complex influence ecosystem, where traditional advertising now represents just one of many forces shaping consumer decision-making - alongside influencers, peer commentary, retail environments, and AI-driven recommendations.

headline: Flywheel Accelerates Its Connected Commerce Vision with Integration of TPN
summary: Flywheel, the worldwide leader in commerce media and technology solutions and part of Omnicom (NYSE: OMC), today announced that TPN, Omnicom's flagship retail and commerce agency, has joined the Flywheel organization.

headline: Here's What to Expect From Omnicom's Next Earnings Report
summary: Omnicom is set to announce its fourth-quarter results soon, with analysts projecting single-digit growth in its bottom-line figure.

headline: Omnicom: 14% Dividend Raise Signals A Bright Outlook
summary: Omnicom looks undervalued with strong dividend coverage, FCF, and IPG synergies driving EPS upside. See why I rate the OMC stock a Buy.
